question: What does Acerbic mean?
solution:
Acerbic

Acerbic = Speaking in a sharp or bitter manner.

Hindi Meaning: तीक्ष्ण एवं प्रत्यक्ष

Root Words: Lat. acerbus = bitter, harsh

question: What does Adhere mean?
solution:
Adhere

Adhere = To stick to or remain attached to something.

Hindi Meaning: प्रथाओं पर विश्वास करें और उनका पालन करें

Root Words: Lat. ad- = to + haerere = to stick

question: Who is an Ambidextrous person?
option_4: One who can write with both hands
solution:
Ambidextrous

Ambidextrous = A person who can use both hands equally well.

Hindi Meaning: बाएं और दाएं हाथ का समान रूप से उपयोग करने में सक्षम

Root Words: Lat. ambi- = both + dexter = right-hand

question: What does Ambivalent mean?
solution:
Ambivalent

Ambivalent = Having contradictory or uncertain feelings.

Hindi Meaning: अच्छी और बुरी दोनों तरह की भावनाएँ रखना या दिखाना

Root Words: Lat. ambi- = both + valere = to be strong

question: Who is an Ambivert?
option_3: A person with both introvert and extrovert traits
solution:
Ambivert

Ambivert = A person displaying both introvert and extrovert qualities.

Hindi Meaning: अंतर्मुखी और बहिर्मुखी दोनों गुणों वाला व्यक्ति

Root Words: ambi (both) + vertere (to turn)

question: What does Amenable mean?
solution:
Amenable

Amenable = Open and responsive to suggestion.

Hindi Meaning: सुझावों और प्रभावों पर तत्परता से प्रतिक्रिया करना / निर्देशित या नियंत्रित होने के लिए तैयार रहना

Root Words: Lat. minari = to threaten (originally)

question: What does Amicable mean?
solution:
Amicable

Amicable = Friendly, without conflict.

Hindi Meaning: कोई ऐसा व्यक्ति जो मिलनसार और अच्छे स्वभाव का हो

Root Words: Lat. amicus = friend

question: What does Askance mean?
solution:
Askance

Askance = With an attitude of suspicion.

Hindi Meaning: वे राष्ट्र जो एक दूसरे पर भरोसा नहीं करते/एक दूसरे को नहीं देखते

Root Words: Uncertain root; often means suspiciously

question: What does Assertive mean?
solution:
Assertive

Assertive = Self-confident and forceful.

Hindi Meaning: विनम्रतापूर्वक दृढ़ और मांग करने का गुण

Root Words: Lat. assertus = claimed

question: What does Bellicose mean?
solution:
Bellicose

Bellicose = Warlike; inclined to fight.

Hindi Meaning: एक व्यक्ति जो लड़ाई का शौकीन है

Root Words: Lat. bellum = war

question: What does Belligerent mean?
solution:
Belligerent

Belligerent = Hostile and confrontational.

Hindi Meaning: युद्धरत; जो युद्ध जैसे मूड में है

Root Words: Lat. bellum = war + gerere = to wage

question: What does Callous mean?
solution:
Callous

Callous = Emotionally unfeeling or cold-hearted.

Hindi Meaning: दयालु भावना और सहानुभूति से रहित एक आदमी

Root Words: Lat. callum = hard skin

question: What does Charismatic mean?
solution:
Charismatic

Charismatic = Compelling charm and appeal.

Hindi Meaning: एक सम्मोहक आकर्षण का प्रयोग करना जो दूसरों में भक्ति की प्रेरणा देता है

Root Words: Related to charisma

question: What does Churlish mean?
solution:
Churlish

Churlish = Rude in a mean-spirited way.

Hindi Meaning: मतलबी और रूखे तरीके से असभ्य

Root Words: Old Eng. ceorl = peasant

question: What is Chutzpah?
solution:
Chutzpah

Chutzpah = Shameless audacity; impudence.

Hindi Meaning: अत्यधिक आत्मविश्वास या दुस्साहस

Root Words: Heb. ḥuṣpāh = insolence

question: What does Complacent mean?
solution:
Complacent

Complacent = Self-satisfied without awareness of danger.

Hindi Meaning: संतुष्ट, बदलाव या सुधार की कोई इच्छा नहीं

Root Words: Lat. complacere = to please

question: What does Conceited mean?
solution:
Conceited

Conceited = Excessively proud of oneself.

Hindi Meaning: अपने आप पर और अपने काम पर बहुत अधिक गर्व करना

Root Words: Lat. concipere = to take in

question: What does Constrained mean?
solution:
Constrained

Constrained = Restricted or limited.

Hindi Meaning: नियंत्रित या सीमित करना

Root Words: Lat. constringere = to bind

question: Who is a Coquette?
solution:
Coquette

Coquette = A flirtatious woman.

Hindi Meaning: नखरा दिखाना; एक लड़की/महिला जो पुरुषों के साथ फ़्लर्ट करती है।

Root Words: Fr. coquet = flirt

question: What does Credulous mean?
solution:
Credulous

Credulous = Ready to believe things easily.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो दूसरों पर आसानी से विश्वास कर लेता है

Root Words: Lat. credulus = too believing

question: What does Devious mean?
solution:
Devious

Devious = Using dishonest tricks to achieve goals.

Hindi Meaning: लक्ष्य प्राप्ति के लिए धूर्त युक्तियों का कुशल उपयोग दर्शाना

Root Words: Lat. devius = off the road

question: What does Dexterous mean?
solution:
Dexterous

Dexterous = Skillful, especially with hands.

Hindi Meaning: अपने हाथों से कुशल

Root Words: Lat. dexter = right (handed)

question: What does Diligent mean?
solution:
Diligent

Diligent = Showing constant effort and care.

Hindi Meaning: अपने काम/कर्तव्यों में सावधानी और प्रयास दिखाना

Root Words: Lat. diligere = to esteem

question: What does Eccentric mean?
solution:
Eccentric

Eccentric = Peculiar or unconventional.

Hindi Meaning: असामान्य आदतों वाला एक आदमी

Root Words: Gr. ek- = out + kentron = center

question: Who is an Egotist?
solution:
Egotist

Egotist = One who is excessively self-important.

Hindi Meaning: घमंडी व्यक्ति

Root Words: ego (I) + tendere (to talk)

question: Who is an Extrovert?
solution:
Extrovert

Extrovert = A social and outgoing person.

Hindi Meaning: बहिर्मुखी व्यक्ति

Root Words: extra (outside) + vertere (to turn)

question: What does Fallible mean?
solution:
Fallible

Fallible = Likely to make errors.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो असफलता या गलतियाँ करने के अधीन है

Root Words: Lat. fallere = to deceive

question: What does Fastidious mean?
solution:
Fastidious

Fastidious = Very concerned about accuracy and cleanliness.

Hindi Meaning: जिसे प्रसन्न करना कठिन हो

Root Words: Lat. fastidium = loathing

question: What does Fickle mean?
solution:
Fickle

Fickle = Frequently changing in loyalty or interest.

Hindi Meaning: बार-बार बदलना

Root Words: OE ficol = deceitful

question: What does Flexible mean?
solution:
Flexible

Flexible = Able to bend or adjust easily.

Hindi Meaning: जिसे आसानी से बिना तोड़े तराशा जा सकता है

Root Words: Lat. flectere = to bend

question: What does Forthright mean?
solution:
Forthright

Forthright = Straightforward and direct.

Hindi Meaning: व्यवहार या भाषण में ईमानदार या सीधा

Root Words: OE forth + right = directly forward

question: What does Fumbling mean?
solution:
Fumbling

Fumbling = Lacking coordination or precision.

Hindi Meaning: कोई काम अजीब या अनाड़ी तरीके से करना

Root Words: OE fumblen = to grope

question: What does Genuine mean?
solution:
Genuine

Genuine = Real and true.

Hindi Meaning: वास्तव में वह चीज़े जो अपनी घोषित, विज्ञापित या प्रतिष्ठित स्रोत से आ रही है

Root Words: Lat. genuinus = innate, natural

question: What does Gregarious mean?
solution:
Gregarious

Gregarious = Fond of company; social.

Hindi Meaning: एक जानवर जो समूह में रहता है / अपनी तरह के अन्य लोगों के साथ जुड़ने की प्रवृत्ति रखता है

Root Words: Lat. gregarius = fond of company, flock

question: What does Gullible mean?
solution:
Gullible

Gullible = Easily tricked or fooled.

Hindi Meaning: जो आसानी से धोखा खा जाता है

Root Words: Related to gull = a dupe

question: What does Heed mean?
solution:
Heed

Heed = Take notice or pay careful attention.

Hindi Meaning: ध्यान देना

Root Words: OE hēdan = to guard, observe

question: Who is a Highbrow?
solution:
Highbrow

Highbrow = A person with refined taste or intellect.

Hindi Meaning: एक व्यक्ति जो संस्कृति और बुद्धि में दूसरों से श्रेष्ठ होने का दावा करता है

Root Words: Slang: intellectual, from phrenology

question: What does Histrionic mean?
solution:
Histrionic

Histrionic = Over-the-top dramatic behavior.

Hindi Meaning: बहुत नाटकीय

Root Words: Lat. histrio = actor

question: What does Hotheaded mean?
solution:
Hotheaded

Hotheaded = Easily angered or impulsive.

Hindi Meaning: जो बहुत जल्द ही अपना आपा खो देता है

Root Words: hot + head = impulsive

question: What is Idiosyncrasy?
solution:
Idiosyncrasy

Idiosyncrasy = A peculiar personal habit.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति की अजीब आदत

Root Words: Gr. idios = own + synkrasis = mixture

question: What does Idiosyncratic mean?
solution:
Idiosyncratic

Idiosyncratic = Unusual or characteristic of an individual.

Hindi Meaning: अजीब या असामान्य आदतें, व्यवहार के तरीके या विशेषताएं होना

Root Words: Gr. idios = personal + synkrasis = blend

question: What does Imitable mean?
solution:
Imitable

Imitable = Capable of being imitated or copied.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ ऐसा जो कॉपी किया जा सके

Root Words: Lat. imitabilis = that can be copied

question: What is Imitation?
solution:
Imitation

Imitation = The act of copying someone or something.

Hindi Meaning: किसी व्यक्ति या चीज़ को मॉडल के रूप में उपयोग करने की क्रिया

Root Words: Lat. imitatio = copying

question: What does Improvident mean?
solution:
Improvident

Improvident = Not showing foresight; spendthrift or thoughtless.

Hindi Meaning: जो व्यक्ति भविष्य की योजना बनाने में बहुत लापरवाह है

Root Words: Lat. im- = not + provident = prudent

question: What does Impudent mean?
solution:
Impudent

Impudent = Not showing due respect for others.

Hindi Meaning: बेशर्मी से असभ्य

Root Words: Lat. im- = not + pudens = modest

question: Who is an Incorrigible person?
solution:
Incorrigible

Incorrigible = Impossible to correct or improve.

Hindi Meaning: जिसे सुधारा न जा सके / जो सुधार से परे है

Root Words: Lat. in- = not + corrigere = to correct

question: What does Industrious mean?
solution:
Industrious

Industrious = Diligent and hardworking.

Hindi Meaning: जो बहुत मेहनत करता है

Root Words: Lat. industria = diligence

question: What does Inexorable mean?
solution:
Inexorable

Inexorable = Impossible to stop or prevent.

Hindi Meaning: विनती से विचलित न होना

Root Words: Lat. inexorabilis = relentless

question: Who is an Infallible person?
solution:
Infallible

Infallible = Incapable of making mistakes.

Hindi Meaning: जो गलती नहीं कर सकता

Root Words: Lat. in- = not + fallere = to deceive

question: What does Inquisitive mean?
solution:
Inquisitive

Inquisitive = Curious or eager to know.

Hindi Meaning: वह व्यक्ति जो चीज़ों को जानने के लिए बहुत उत्सुक हो और सवाल पूछता हो

Root Words: Lat. inquirere = to seek
